thread.title: 69 new emojis have just been revealed - including a bearded man and a woman wearing a hijab
thread.title_full: 69 new emojis have just been revealed - including a bearded man and a woman wearing a hijab

author: Liz Connor
title: 69 new emojis have just been revealed - including a bearded man and a woman wearing a hijab
text:
69 new emojis have just been revealed - including a bearded man and a woman wearing a hijab 
Itâ€™s been a long time coming Friday 24 March 2017 15:00 GMT Click to followES Lifestyle New emojis are coming Unicode A new set of 69 emoji has been unveiled - and there are some long awaited ones coming to iPhones. Unicode Consortium, the official body responsible for setting a standard of characters across the computing industry, has released a list of the new emoji to be making their way into our lives, as part of the 5.0 update. Included in the update are a breastfeeding mum, a yoga-loving woman and a bearded man. Meanwhile, Muslim women will be better represented as part of the new set of characters. A woman wearing a hijab has been confirmed as part of the lineup. Emoji users have rejoiced at the culinary additions to the language, which include paella, steak, pie and a coconut. These are the 10 emojis that Londoners use the most There is also a whole new line in sporting emojis including a rock climber and a cricket bat. All of the new emoji are technically still in draft mode, but Unicode is expected to release the final version in June 2017 . Top 10 emojis used by Londoners Top 10 emojis used by Londoners 1/10 
Tears of Joy emoji face 2/10
